name: Doja Cat
description:
'''Amala Ratna Zandile Dlamini''' (born October 21, 1995), known professionally as '''Doja Cat''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|d|oʊ|d|ʒ|ə}}), is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer. Known for her versatility, live performing skills, internet personality and stage presence, she is frequently referred to as the "[[Honorific nicknames in popular music|Queen of Pop-Rap]]".{{NoteTag|Doja Cat has been referred to as the "Queen of Pop-Rap" by numerous publications, including [[NBC|NBC News]],<ref>{{Cite web |last=Piester |first=Lauren |date=2025-09-27 |title=Get to Know Every Musical Guest for Saturday Night Live Season 51 |url=https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/snl-musical-guests-season-51-2025-to-2026-schedule |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=NBC |language=en-US |quote=The pop-rap queen, known for hits like "Kiss Me More" and the recent "Jealous Type," promotes her Vie, her fifth studio album, released on September 26.}}</ref> [[CBS News]],<ref>{{Cite web |last=Pauley |first=Jane |author-link=Jane Pauley |title=Doja Cat: "I'm very proud of the music I'm making now" |url=https://www.cbsnews.com/video/doja-cat-im-very-proud-of-the-music-im-making-now/ |access-date=2025-10-01 |website=CBS News |language=en-US |quote=[Video]: The artist known as Doja Cat is often called the "Queen of Pop-Rap", [...]. With the new album coming out, she is talking with our Michelle Miller}}</ref> [[CNN-News18|CNN News]],<ref>{{Cite news |last=Narain |first=Yatamanyu |date=2025-08-23 |title=Doja Cat Is Back With New Album Vie, Releases 80s-Inspired First Single ‘Jealousy Type’ |url=https://www.news18.com/movies/hollywood/doja-cat-is-back-with-new-album-vie-releases-80s-inspired-first-single-jealousy-type-aa-ws-l-9523808.html |work=[[CNN-News18]]}}</ref> [[BeIN |language=en-us}}</ref> ''[[The Guardian]]'',<ref>{{Cite news |last=Petridis |first=Alexis |date=2021-06-24 |title=Doja Cat: Planet Her review – pop-rap queen is in a world of her own |url=https://www.theguardian.com/music/2021/jun/24/doja-cat-planet-her-review-kiss-me-more-tiktok-dance-2021-pop |access-date=2025-09-30 |work=The Guardian |language=en-GB |issn=0261-3077}}</ref> Grammy-award-winning queen of pop rap, Doja Cat, to deep dive into her little Black beauty book...}}</ref> ''[[The Economic Times]]'',<ref>{{Cite news |last=Tomslee |first=Don |date=2025-08-25 |url=https://dailyhive.com/vancouver/doja-cat-vancouver |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=Daily Hive |language=en}}</ref> ''[[The Music (magazine)|The Music]]'',<ref>{{Cite web |last=Robinson |language=en |quote=The head-spinning queen of pop-rap has stunned fans with a grand total of zero (0) collabs on new album ‘Scarlet’. Over the past decade, the queen of pop-rap has doled us out a full suite of giant plot twists}}</ref> ''[[Time Out (magazine)|Time Out]]'',<ref>{{Cite news |last=Stubbs |first=Winnie |date=2025-09-10 |title=You want it? Say so! Doja Cat is officially coming to Sydney this year |url=https://www.timeout.com/sydney/news/how-to-get-tickets-for-doja-cat-in-sydney-pre-sale-dates-venue-and-more-082225 |archive-url= |archive-date= |access-date=2025-09-30 |work=Time Out |language=en-AU |quote=The queen of pop-rap will be taking over Sydney’s Qudos Bank Arena on Monday, December 1.}}</ref> ''[[Tempo (Indonesian magazine)|Tempo]]'',<ref>{{Cite web |last=Rimayanti |first=Vidya Amalia |date=2025-08-25 |title=Doja Cat's Net Worth and the Buzz Around Her Verse Feesa |url=https://en.tempo.co/read/2043040/doja-cats-net-worth-and-the-buzz-around-her-verse-fees |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=Tempo |quote=With a nickname of Queen of Pop Rap, Doja Cat’s net worth now...}}</ref> ''[[The Cincinnati Enquirer]]'',<ref>{{Cite web |last=Sloan |first=Kaycee |title='Saturday Night Live' returns this weekend. Who is hosting? Who is the musical guest? |url=https://www.cincinnati.com/story/entertainment/television/2025/10/03/who-is-hosting-snl-this-weekend-bad-bunny-returns-with-doja-cat/86369260007/ |access-date=2025-10-03 |website=The Enquirer |language=en-US}}</ref> ''[[Staten Island Advance]]'',<ref>{{Cite web |last=Vecera |first=Mattea |date=2025-09-27 |title=Is there a new ‘Saturday Night Live’ episode tonight (9/27/25)? When does ‘SNL’ premiere? |url=https://www.silive.com/entertainment/2025/09/is-there-a-new-saturday-night-live-episode-tonight-92725-when-does-snl-premiere.html |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=Staten Island Advance |language=en}}</ref> ''[[Austin American-Statesman]]'',<ref>{{Cite web |last=Stith |first=Deborah Sengupta |date=2023-08-31 |title=Your fall Austin music guide is here with Doja Cat, Travis Scott, Luis Miguel and more |url=https://www.statesman.com/story/entertainment/music/2023/08/31/concerts-live-music-near-me-austin-fall-travis-scott-doja-cat-acl-fest-moody-center/70705237007/ |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=Austin American-Statesman |language=en |quote=When the reigning '''queen of [[hip-pop]]''' played ACL Fest in 2021, she delivered a truly astonishing performance.}}</ref> [[MyLondon]],<ref>{{Cite web |last=Carr |first=Stewart |date=2025-09-29 |title=Doja Cat announces London The O2 date for her Tour Ma Vie World Tour |url=https://www.mylondon.news/whats-on/music-nightlife-news/doja-cat-announces-london-o2-32574964 |access-date=2025-10-01 |website=My London |language=en |quote='The queen of pop-rap' will play one night in London for her Ma Vie World Tour}}</ref> and ''[[Tribun Network]]''.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2025-09-30 |title=Terjemahan Lirik Lagu Gorgeous - Doja Cat: Yeah, Look at Me, Really Look at Me |url=https://www.tribunnews.com/musik/7735505/terjemahan-lirik-lagu-gorgeous-doja-cat-yeah-look-at-me-really-look-at-me |access-date=2025-09-30 |website=Tribun Network |language=id-ID |quote=Sebagai artis yang kerap memadukan berbagai genre, ia hingga mendapat julukan, "Queen of Pop-Rap".}}</ref>}} ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' named her "one of the world's biggest pop stars" and "one of the defining pop stars of this era", while ''[[Time (magazine)|Time]]'' listed her as one of the [[Time 100|world's most influential people]] in 2023.

Doja Cat began making and releasing music on [[SoundCloud]] as a teenager. Her song "[[So High (Doja Cat song)|So High]]" caught the attention of [[Kemosabe Records|Kemosabe]] and [[RCA Records]], with whom she signed a [[recording contract]] prior to the release of her debut extended play, ''[[Purrr!]]'' (2014). After a hiatus from releasing music and the uneventful rollout of her debut studio album, ''[[Amala (album)|Amala]]'' (2018), she earned [[Viral phenomenon|viral success]] as an [[internet meme]] with her 2018 single "[[Mooo!]]", a [[novelty song]] in which she makes humorous claims about being a cow. Capitalizing on her growing popularity, she released her second studio album, ''[[Hot Pink (album)|Hot Pink]]'', in the following year. The album eventually reached the top ten of the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and spawned the single "[[Say So]]"; its remix with [[Nicki Minaj]] topped the US [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. 

Doja Cat's third studio album, ''[[Planet Her]]'' (2021), spent forty-one weeks in the ''Billboard'' 200's top 10 and became the 10th best-selling album globally of 2021. It produced the top ten singles "[[Kiss Me More]]" (featuring [[SZA]]), "[[Need to Know (Doja Cat song)|Need to Know]]", and "[[Woman (Doja Cat song)|Woman]]". Her fourth studio album, ''[[Scarlet (Doja Cat album)|Scarlet]]'' (2023), adopted a [[hip-hop]]-oriented sound and peaked within the top five of the ''Billboard'' 200. Its lead single "[[Paint the Town Red (Doja Cat song)|Paint the Town Red]]" topped the Hot 100, the [[Billboard Global 200|''Billboard'' Global 200]], and numerous charts internationally. Her fifth album, [[Vie (Doja Cat album)|''Vie'']], marked a return to her [[pop music|pop]] roots and also peaked within the top five of the ''Billboard'' 200.

Doja Cat is one of the [[List of best-selling female rappers|best-selling female rappers of all time]], with over 34 million records sold between 2018 and 2022. In 2024, ''Billboard'' ranked her as the 24th top woman artist and 2nd female rapper of the 21st century—five years after her first charted record (2019). Since 2020, [[List of awards and nominations received by Doja Cat|she has won hundreds of accolades]], including a [[Grammy Awards|Grammy Award]] from 19 nominations, six [[Billboard Music Awards|''Billboard'' Music Awards]], five [[American Music Awards]], six [[MTV Video Music Awards]] and eight [[iHeartRadio Music Awards]].{{Efn|Including six iHeartRadio Titanium Awards for one billion spins on iHeartRadio stations.}}
